comments: 'Aloysius' was the name taken when confirmed into the Catholic Church, see Barnhart, Biogr. Notes upon Botanists (1965).
examples: Rulac californica Nieuwl. in Amer. Midl. Naturalist 2: 139. (1911)
source: CMI, Missouri Bryological list from R.E.G.Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991.  Biogr. info. in Amer. Midl. Nat., 161(2): 178-188 (2009), incl. portr.
